ProductInfo.Features:
16 Channel DVR with Real-Time 960H and D1 Resolution
Pre-Installed 2TB Audio/Video Rated SATA Hard Drive, HDMI® Port for High Resolution Viewing options with included Standard HDMI cable
16 960H CCD Cameras with 700TV Lines of Resolution, All-Metal Weatherproof Cameras for Indoor and Outdoor Use
50 Feet of Night Vision and up to 100ft with Additional Ambient Lighting, Includes 60ft and 100ft Cables
Free Q-See Apps for iPhone, iPad, Android, and Windows Phone, PC and Mac Compatibility, Email Alerts with Incident Snapshots
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QT5616 2TB HDD Hard Drive 16 Channel 960H/D1 DVR Premium Security System with 16 700TVL Cameras
